import React, { useRef } from 'react' import plane from "../../images/plane.png" export default function ResetPassword() { async function HandleResetPass(e){ e.preventDefault(); const LoginEmailRef = useRef(null); var token = localStorage.getItem("token"); const fetchResult = fetch("http://localhost:8000/api/logout", { method: "POST", headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json", Authorization: `Bearer ${token}`, }, body:JSON.stringify() }); } return ( <>

Forget Your Password?

Please enter your email address below to recieve your user and a new password.

) }
